law.catch_line: Additional bonds for establishment of hospital.
law.text: If the city legislative body finds that the bonds first authorized will be insufficient to accomplish the purpose desired, additional bonds may be authorized and issued subject to the same procedure.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235i-13.
